channel.title: Streamlit on Shreyash Somvanshi
channel.description: Recent content in Streamlit on Shreyash Somvanshi

item.title: Sentiment Analysis using NLP
item.description: Introduction: Welcome to our Sentiment Analysis Project! Our project aims to analyze the sentiment of text data to understand public opinion, feedback, or emotions expressed in various contexts. Objective: Develop a sentiment analysis model to automatically classify text data into positive, negative, or neutral sentiments. Explore how sentiment analysis can be applied to social media posts, product reviews, or customer feedback to gain valuable insights. Dataset Description: Utilized a dataset containing text data, such as social media posts, customer reviews, or movie reviews, labeled with sentiment labels.

item.title: Phishing Website Detection
item.description: Introduction: Welcome to our Phishing Website Detection Project! Our project aims to develop a system capable of automatically detecting phishing websites to enhance online security. Objective: Develop a machine learning model to classify websites as legitimate or phishing based on their characteristics. Explore the use of features such as URL structure, domain age, SSL certificates, and website content to identify potential phishing attempts. Dataset Description: Utilized a dataset containing labeled examples of legitimate and phishing websites.
